articles.title: Senators grill RFK Jr. over chaos at CDC: Takeaways from the fiery hearing
articles.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faced intense questioning from both sides of the aisle regarding controversial decisions, including vaccine guidance, funding cuts, and personnel changes at the CDC. He clashed with lawmakers, defended his actions, and made claims about vaccine safety and COVID-19 deaths.

articles.title: Top news of the day: 'Lost' India and Russia to 'dark China', says Trump; Mumbai Police launch investigation after receiving message threatening to 'blow up' city, and more
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump commented on India and Russia's relationship with China following the SCO meeting. The Mumbai police have issued a Lookout Circular against Shilpa Shetty and Raj Kundra in a cheating case. Additionally, Britain's Duchess of Kent has passed away at 92.
